name: Pro Strategy Football 2019
description: Customize everything about your league, team, players, and images! Tailor and share images and leagues! Coach! Manage! Run or watch simulations! Analyze games! Enjoy real coaching with real ratings, weather, injuries, penalties, everything you expect in a simulation!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 and above Processor: Intel Pentium 3, Intel Core, AMD Athlon 1 GHz+ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: minimum resolution: 1366x768 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: More disk space if you create multiple image sets
